title: [Merelle's Magic Shoppe]
[Merelle's Outfitting]
description: An intricate knot-worked wall-hanging hangs on one of the white brocade walls, and a modwir beam ceiling rises overhead.  A wyvern painted ivory vase sits in one corner of a plain cherrywood floor.  There is a carved oak table on one side of the shop and a large cherrywood cabinet on the other.
